name: TooltipTrigger
description: Element that triggers the tooltip on hover or focus. Renders a `<button>` element.

props.name: className
props.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

props.name: closeDelay
props.description: How long to wait before closing the tooltip. Specified in milliseconds.

props.name: delay
props.description: How long to wait before opening the tooltip. Specified in milliseconds.

props.name: handle
props.description: A handle to associate the trigger with a tooltip.

props.name: payload
props.description: A payload to pass to the tooltip when it is opened.

props.name: render
props.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.
